script.text: "Because sometimes when I'm like eating cereal or something in the morning, my stomach'll get too full really quick because they're so big."
"So what happens is, as soon as I finish breakfast, right away I feel bloated to start off with."
(Setup) "Then about an hour later, I think maybe I need to go take a nap."
(Setup) "I don't know why I do this either because I always have work to be doing during the day."
(Setup) "It could also happen where I might eat lunch early before I leave work."
(Setup) "And by the time I come home around dinner time again, I feel tired already."

script.text: (Setup) "My housemates, we live together. They moved here recently. So everything was new for them."
